title: Coach-car collision claims two lives in Khuzdar - Pakistan - DAWN.COM
content:
KHUZDAR: Two persons were killed and as many injured in a collision between a passenger coach and a car near Coast Guards check post on the Quetta-Karachi Highway in Uthal on Friday.

Police officials said that after the incident, Edhi Foundation reached the site along with police and shifted the bodies and the injured to district hospital. The injured were later referred to Karachi due their critical condition.

The deceased were identified as Fayyaz Ahmed and Zaheer Ahmed hailing from Mastung town.

The bodies were handed over to the families after medico-legal formalities.

Published in Dawn, June 21th, 2025
